features: 【Tall Phone Tripod】 Phone tripod has an admirable Height, extending from 19.6 Inches to 71 Inches. With its tall adjustable height design and 180° rotation neck -360° rotation head, this tripod for iphone is perfect for capturing those hard-to-reach shots and shooting from unique angles.

【Selfie Stick Tripod with Remote】 Cellphone tripod can be used as an extra long selfie stick, suitable for taking photos group family photos. Built-in wireless remote allows you to easily control your phone's camera from a distance of 33ft /10m, giving you even more flexibility and creativity. Phone tripod with remote can be perfectly compatible with iOS or Android.

【Professional Phone Tripod】 Cellphone tripod stands with its sturdy and reliable structure, ensuring you never have to worry about shaky or blurry shots again. Aluminum travel tripod and non-slip rubber legs are specially designed to withstand any surface and provide the stability you need to capture sharp, clear images.

【Versatile Travel Tripod】 Whether you're shooting outdoor landscapes or indoor portraits, cellphone tripod is the ideal companion for all your photography needs. This lightweight tripod is portable with a carry bag, compact, and easy to use, making it the perfect accessory for recording life, family and friends reunions, trips, hiking, camping, and parties, no matter indoor or outdoor activities.

【Tripod for Phone 】 iPhone Tripod stand with a universal phone holder, which can rotate 360 ° and is compatible with iPhone 14 13 12 11/11 Pro/XS Max/XS/XR/X/8/8 plus/ Galaxy Note 9/S10/S20 and so on. With a standard 1/4"-20 screw, allowing it to be compatible with a wide range of devices.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nineigh 71 Inch Phone Tripod Stand for Recording, Selfie Stick Tripod,with Remote The built-in remote control of the tripod can remotely control the phone to take photos and videos. Free your hands for a more convenient way to use.Lightweight Tripod weight is 1.37 lb, and its folding size is 19.6 inches, compact lightweight design makes it easy to travel and carry.Portable tripod with a carry bag means you can carry it quickly and easily, and store it without taking up space.Aluminum phone tripod made of high-quality aluminum alloy material, durable, and the non-slip rubber feet design makes it stable and sturdy, and can meet the needs of most photography enthusiasts.Selfie stick tripod can be used as a selfie stick, pull out the knob at the bottom, and you have an extremely long selfie stick, which is 65 inches long. you are allowed to capture broader beautiful sceneries with ease. Camera tripod has 3-position legs angle adjustment system that helps it stand sturdy, and take photos and video recordings flexibly for different scenarios and photography conditions.

Cellphone Tripod with Remote Phone Mount for Video Vlogging Photography 3 Steps to Set up Your Wireless Remote Shutter Turn ON of the wireless remote control. When the Blue Lights start to blink, it means that the remote control has started to find the device.Open your phone's Settings and look for the name of the remote control: AB Shutter 3. Then click Pair Device.After pairing, turn on the camera and start taking photos and recording videos! Remote shutter is compatible with most iOS and Android smartphones (supporting a distance of 10 m / 33 ft), With a high-quality button battery, you can take more than 20000 photos.

Tripod for Phone Camera, All-in-one Tripod Stand Tripod stand is equipped with a standard 1/4" screw on the head, suitable for many devices, including smartphones, cameras, action cameras ring lights, projectors, or any other types of equipment.
Professional Camera & Cell Phone Tripod, Meets All Your Needs.

Tripod with Universal Phone Holder, Suitable for Most Cell Phones Universal Phone Holder can rotate 360°, suitable size between 2.28-4 inches. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mom in Digital Marketing Approved: A Review of the Versatile Phone Tripod
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my wife and this is what she had to say:As a mom deeply immersed in digital marketing, finding tools that seamlessly integrate into my content creation is essential. The tall phone tripod has been a game-changer in my photography arsenal, and here's why:Impressive Height and Flexibility: The adjustable height, extending from 19.6 inches to 71 inches, offers unparalleled versatility. Paired with a 180° rotation neck and a 360° rotation head, capturing those elusive shots and experimenting with unique angles has become effortlessly achievable.Selfie Stick & Remote Combo: The tripod doubles as an extra-long selfie stick, perfect for family photos. The built-in wireless remote, with a range of 33 feet, adds a layer of convenience. Controlling my phone's camera remotely has elevated both flexibility and creativity in my photography sessions.Professional Stability: No more worries about shaky shots. The sturdy structure and non-slip rubber legs of this tripod ensure a reliable foundation for capturing clear, blur-free images. Its professional-grade build aligns perfectly with my standards for high-quality visuals.Versatility on the Go: Whether I'm capturing outdoor landscapes or indoor portraits, this tripod is a dependable companion. Its portability, complete with a carry bag, makes it an ideal accessory for documenting life's moments, from family reunions to outdoor adventures.Universal Compatibility:The tripod's universal phone holder, compatible with a range of devices including the latest iPhones and Galaxy models, simplifies my workflow. The 360° rotation adds a layer of flexibility, accommodating various shooting scenarios seamlessly.In summary, the tall phone tripod has seamlessly integrated into my digital marketing toolkit, offering the height, stability, and versatility I need. It's a must-have for any mom navigating the intersection of family life and professional content creation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Given the price, I was hesitant of the quality. But was pleasantly surprised. Quick and easy to assemble. Work’s great with my iPhone 11. Seems like it should last a very long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works as it was intended to work.
reviews.reviewText: Someone previously said that the bag is to small for the tripod to fit in it, "not true" it is not to small when you disassemble the tripod like you're suppose to they must of forgot the fact that when you open the box that it comes in everything is in the bag, so I guess that would mean it fits in the bag.:)It works like it's suppose to, but is cheaply made of plastic of course what do you expect for 27 dollars come on people you will just need to be very careful with it it's that simple. It does work as it was intended to work, but I would have paid a little more to have a better product. Either way I need it for what it does, so if it breaks I will buy another one until someone comes out with something like this that is made better for a reasonable price. If you need it buy it that's my honest opinion, just don't expect to get something that will last for years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can put my phone on the pole without having to take the cover off, this is important for me.Also the height, the versatility and the sturdiness of this product makes me feel content of buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for events
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use for cheer competitions! We have used it for 1 competition and 2 routines! It is great! The remote helps so I don’t have to hit the stop button on my phone when they are done! I can just hit that button and pick up the stand to move for the next team!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We do a lot of videos, and this stand has been wonderful. It goes up 7ft and is very sturdy. No worried about the phone tipping over with excessive movement. It is also very easy to move up and down with the easy, but firm clips that lock it in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I can’t live without my tripod

reviews.reviewText: Broke my previous tripod. This does the job. Not flimsy at all. Shipping was fast. Would recommend.

This tripod (and/or selfie stick - depending on how you use it) has become my go-to accessory for capturing stable and professional-looking photos and videos. This versatile tripod is loaded with features that make it a must-have for any content creator or photography enthusiast.One of the standout features of this tripod is its adjustable height. With a maximum height of 70 inches, it allows for a wide range of shooting angles and perspectives. Whether I'm taking selfies, group photos, or shooting videos, this tripod ensures that my phone is at the perfect eye-level, resulting in stunning, well-framed shots.The included remote phone holder is incredibly convenient. It securely holds my phone in place, allowing me to capture shots without worrying about accidental slips or drops. The remote control enables me to take photos and start/stop videos from a distance, adding flexibility to my shooting process.Overall, this is a reliable and feature-packed accessory. Its sturdy build, adjustable height, and remote phone holder make it an essential tool for capturing high-quality photos and videos. Whether you're a vlogger, traveller, or simply want to up your selfie game, this tripod is a fantastic addition to your photography arsenal.

I've had 3 good phone tripods but none as good as this one. Tallest, easiest to use, solid even at full height, extremely adjustable (I got the goose neck attachment for just a couple of bucks more, highly recommended). Will probably grab a couple more soon
I create art and this little thing has helped me vlog it

It is a very complete article. I thought it would be a simple stick, but it's more than that. It is of very good quality, firm, and extensive. Ideal for going to the beach or places with beautiful landscapes. To take beautiful photos. It is a larger item than a cheap stick, so it could be uncomfortable, for example, for photos in shopping malls or parties with a lot of people.
